checkItem.details: Enter the details of your case in the form below. This can be either a statement or a link. After you submit your case, we are going to check, if we have already worked on that specific case. If yes, you will be presented the results of our investigation. If not, we are going to hand the case over to our team of detectives, who are then going to check it for you.
